::Ramulus/Striker::

Ramulus nods, recieving Liono's orders. He walks out of the Ark and up to 
Liono. "Allright," he says, "I'm ready."

His eyes narrow as he sees Zardus fly into the clearing. "Isn't he supposed 
to meet us at the place?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Striker walks back into the war room, looking around at all the maximals 
assembled. This was rather humorsome how the meeting kept being delayed.

"Liono is going to negotiate a treaty with Hell Beast, Megatron, and Zardus," 
he says, "I guess you're all dismissed untill he gets back."
